listing.listing_description: Located right on Park City’s Historic Main Street, within a short stroll of boutique shops and restaurants, as well as two of Park City Resort’s most popular ski access points, this luxurious two-bedroom has it all. Perfect for an exciting honeymoon, family ski vacation, or couples retreat, both of Parkite’s private bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and either a king or queen sized bed. With such an incredibly convenient location, you’ll have no trouble hitting the slopes first thing in the morning, and enjoying the vibrant nightlife of Park City, Utah.Parkite on Main Two Zero takes the modernized alpine luxury to new levels with its elegant white color scheme, designer furnishings, and contemporary accent pieces. Even the brick fireplaces have a modern twist to them, while still providing that rustic, warm feeling that only a roaring fire can. The open concept layout makes the living room a great social environment, perfect for gathering with the family and telling stories from an exciting day on the mountain.This ultra-modern alpine home comes equipped with cable and Apple TV, an integrated sound system, Wi-Fi, and air conditioning. In the kitchen, you’ll love the stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, wine cooler, and granite island countertop that doubles as a breakfast bar. Outside, you’ll have an incredible view of the city from the relaxing hot tub and a furnished outdoor lounge. You’ll also have the use of one space in the building’s underground parking garage.Ski access is easy in Park City, with Town Lift and Park City Mountain Resort Base both within a ten-minute walk. If you’d like to travel a little further, Deer Valley and Canyon’s Village offer even more exciting alpine action, both are located within a short drive. Just downstairs, on Historic Main Street, you’ll find plenty of cafes, restaurants, boutique shops, and local pubs to try out on your unforgettable Park City ski vacation. And, if you’re in town on a summer Sunday, check out the Park Silly Sunday Market and enjoy incredible street performers, live music, local merchants, and plenty of great food.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This charming villa blends contemporary attitude with traditional French Caribbean style. Set in a tropical courtyard with circular drive, the grand raised entrance begins the crescendo for the view. Set right at the ocean’s edge, the stunning scene flows over the wide green lawn right out to the turquoise sea and beyond to Anguilla and the poetic mountains of St Martin. Step through the gate right out to the sand.Every room enjoys incredible views. The main living area’s glass doors disappear, giving you full access to the sea breezes and nature’s beauty. A spacious open plan includes multiple areas for lounging and dining. The villa’s décor tastefully mixes Indonesian teak with contemporary pieces in soft white. The sleek kitchen is a wonderful place to prepare a meal while taking advantage of the view and your guests.Ample outdoor living includes sea facing covered verandas that connect all the rooms with the main house providing multiple opportunities for dining and relaxing. Oversize travertine tiles flow throughout blending the Epi wood pool deck for a seamless transition from interior to exterior. The large classic pool, the centerpiece of the deck, creates a visual connection with the sea. A grand gazebo sits at the ocean’s edge where you can relax in comfortable seating and enjoy the music of the surf from sunrise to sunset. If you prefer private garden views, a large well-furnished deck sits off the main living area. Large and small colorful tropical gardens are placed throughout the villa.Four of the five bedrooms have private seating areas and sea views. The fifth bedroom is located at garden level with a private patio. The décor is a mix of soothing whites and warm beiges. The en suite bathrooms have a stylish spa feel complete with river stone trimmed showers, teak benches and marble tiles. Several bathrooms have ocean views.Although secluded, you are close to amenities. you are ten minutes to Porto Cupecoy’s fabulous restaurants and seven minutes to the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, the Creole Market, galleries and shopping. Only 10 minutes from the International SXM airport and 30 minutes to both Grand Case and Phillipsburg. _ Please Note: Baie Rouge Beach may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns. For the best swimming renters are recommended to walk down the beach near the public entrance where the waters are more protected. _

listing.listing_description: Its name meaning "take your time" in local patois, this superb villa invites you to disconnect and savor the enchanting beauty of Jamaica's north coast. The five-bedroom home is nestled amid lush gardens on a hilltop within the exclusive Rose Hall Estate, offering serene seclusion just steps from Cinnamon Hill Golf Course and a few minutes from the estate's beach club. Fabulous amenities for dining and entertainment include a pool terrace with bar and an ample veranda with alfresco dining. The private staff enhances every aspect of your stay with their warmth, expertise, and gourmet talents.Verdant gardens create an ambiance of tropical oasis under the open sky, while the villa's upper balconies gaze out on sweeping ocean views. A walkway leads through the forest to a charming gazebo perched above placid waters. Refresh you body in the hot tub and pool, and relish a delicious breakfast with Jamaican coffee on the patio in the morning light. Bathe in the afternoon sun on stylish lounge chairs, sipping hand-made drinks from the bar.The villa's main living area comprises an ample veranda and open-concept interior joined by broad pocket doors. Two alfresco lounges accompany a dining table made of a lovely glass pane perched atop an authentic tree trunk. The central living room leads to an interior dining room with French doors opening out to the garden and fountain. Upstairs, an additional salon opens to a furnished balcony—a fine setting for games or casual meals.All five bedrooms at Tek Time feature ensuite bathrooms, Televisions, and access to either a private balcony or terrace. Both of the master suites include king beds and deluxe bathrooms with dual vanities. The media room includes an additional sofa bed and ensuite bathroom. Air conditioning and ceiling fans complement the garden-scented breezes that circulate throughout the home.Tek Time is within walking distance of Cinnamon Hill Golf Course and a short drive of Rose Hall Beach Club, as well as the beach and golf club at Half Moon Resort. Sugar Mill Falls Water Park is also within minutes. With Sangster International Airport just thirteen kilometers away, Tek Time is an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this property has an open plan and privacy between bedrooms may be limited. The bedroom with 2 twin beds is separated from the living area by an electric privacy curtain. Please speak with your Villa Specialist for more details. Sip cocktails in the hot tub as you watch the sailboats navigate Whangagora Harbour at this trendy open concept villa in the forested hills of New Zealand. Turn up the sound system and air conditioning for nights in with good friends. On special occasions, bring in one of New Zealand’s top chefs. In the morning, set out to explore 90 Mile Beach, charter a fishing boat, or visit a local winery. Stately furnishings and stylish architecture give Kauri Hill Villa a trendy-farmhouse vibe that fits right in with the rugged, yet luxurious nature of New Zealand. The open concept layout promotes a social atmosphere, allowing guests to enjoy different spaces without missing out on the group dynamic. Let your inner chef shine in the fully equipped kitchen while you try your hand at some local favorites. When the afternoon heat is at its peak, hide out in the air conditioning and catch a rugby match on the satellite television. Then head out to a local market and pick up something to barbeque for dinner. The formal and alfresco setting both have incredible harbour views, or you could keep it casual and pack up a picnic to have down by the water. Set out for an adventure on the water tracking Blue and Striped Marlin in Whangaroa Harbour, where fishing charters are easy to find. In the Afternoon, head for the links and play a round at Kauri Cliffs, one of the PGA Tour’s favorite stops. Explore the shops, restaurants, and bars in the Bay of Islands, each with its own unique set of ocean views and historical character. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Let the warm sea and five-star service wash—and pamper—your cares away at Villa Neung. Part of the exclusive gated Mandalay Beach Villas on the gorgeous coast of Koh Samui, this three-bedroom vacation rental offers true luxury in its melding of a beautiful beachfront setting, attentive staff and thoughtful modern design.Your stay at Villa Neung begins with a complimentary airport transfer, and includes continental breakfast and the services of a chef, housekeeper and property manager. Spend your holiday enjoying the sea breeze from a lounge chair by the infinity pool, or step down to the beach to sunbathe or paddle along the shore in one of the villa’s kayaks. In the evenings, try out local seafood on the barbecue and make the most of the balmy weather with dinner at the al-fresco table.The villa’s layout separates the property into two halves: one with the open-air great room, the other with the more private bedrooms. In the great room, you can opt to let the warm air waft in over the relaxed yet refined wicker sectional and chic Louis Ghost-style dining chairs, or let the blinds down for shade. At the far end of the room, the fully equipped kitchen features an inviting breakfast bar and sleek, state-of-the-art appliances.Each of the three bedrooms at Villa Neung has a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and opens to the terrace. Details like built-in cupboards and shelves, low-slung beds with crisp white bedding and wicker accent chairs give the bedrooms serene, comfortable appeal.Whether you’ve come to Koh Samui for a family beach vacation or a tropical honeymoon, you’ll find something near Villa Neung to please. The property is located right on the sands of Ban Laem Noi, and there are five other beaches to explore within an 18 km drive, from Nathon with its pier and night market to trendy Bophut. Play a round of golf at Santiburi Samui Country Club, visit the charming oceanfront Fisherman’s Village Plaza, stand in awe at Big Buddha Temple or meet local fauna at Na Muang Safari Park. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 23 km drive from the villa to Samui Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: All bookings with travel dates taking place after January 1st 2019, will be subject to a 4.712% General Excise Tax & a 10.25% Transient Accommodations Tax. All additional fees & all other service-related costs, will be subject to the taxes above.Give your family vacation or special occasion aloha spirit at Kamilo at Mauna Lani 321. Set in the private Kamilo community, the villa gives you access to amenities like a huge shared pool and barbecue pavilion, plus the perks of the Mauna Lani Resort. With views of the mountains and a golf course, high-end finishes and three spacious bedrooms, the villa is both beautiful and comfortable—much like Hawaii itself.Thanks to fully retractable pocket doors, the villa’s great room opens completely to an inviting covered lanai with a dining area, lounge chairs and a built-in gas barbecue. Step off the lanai to the sunny terrace, which has more lounge chairs for sunbathing, a pool and a hot tub. For more outdoor space, head to the Kamilo community’s shared pool, fitness center and barbecue pavilion. Villa guests also enjoy access the Mauna Lani beach club, golf course, tennis courts and spa.Kamilo at Mauna Lani 321 is laid out around a central great room, which uses a traditional tropical palette and modern lines to create an airy, refined space. Dark wood furniture is paired with cream upholstery in the sitting and dining areas as a nod to island style, and a grasscloth-covered vaulted ceiling adds warmth to the open room. The fully equipped kitchen has a more contemporary feel, with glossy stone countertops, stainless steel appliances and an island with a breakfast bar.Each of the villa’s three bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom. The master suite has a king bed, walk-in closet and a terrace with lounge chairs perfect for a mid-morning nap or nighttime stargazing. A second bedroom also has a king bed, and the third bedroom has a queen bed and walk-in closet. As in the great room, dark wood furnishings, neutral-toned carpets and walls and accents like palm-print bedding or grasscloth-covered ceilings give the bedrooms tropical style with a modern twist.From the Kamilo community, it’s just a 15-minute walk to the restaurants, shops and grocery store at Mauna Lani. Take the car for the 5-minute drive to the Mauna Lani beach club and fitness center or the Francis H. I’i Brown Golf Course, or the 12-minute drive to Hapuna Beach. Spend an afternoon at Waimea, 18 miles away, or Waikoloa, 29 miles away. At the end of your stay, plan on a 22-mile drive from the villa to Kona International Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: W87703515-01

listing.listing_description: Indulge in the luxury of outdoor living at Villa Luwih. This spectacular Bali vacation rental has al-fresco spaces perfectly designed for enjoying the ocean views—and indoor spaces you can open to Canggu’s tropical breezes. Its layout is also ideal for groups of friends or extended family on holiday together, and a full staff will ensure that every guest is pampered.Outside, Villa Luwih has two infinity pools, areas for lounging and dining, and a bar and barbecue; inside, the residence features a media room, Apple TV, a sound system and Wi-Fi. Your stay also includes the services of the villa chef, manager, housekeeper and security staff.The villa’s glass-fronted rooms, whose edges frame the rolling waves just off Pererenan Beach, feel like a honeymoon from the everyday. Polished stone tile or wood flooring is cool underfoot, plump sofas and wicker chairs are comfortable and inviting, and local artwork lends traditional inspiration. While chef service is included in your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen with a sleek breakfast bar.Villa Luwih has five bedrooms with king beds, including one with a lounge area and one with a private semi-outdoor bathroom, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning (which is not available in the common areas of the residence).While you could easily spend a week or two luxuriating in the villa’s amenities, the property’s location makes it equally easy to explore the Canggu area. It’s only a 5-minute walk from the villa to Pererenan Beach, and popular Echo and Kuta beaches are only a short drive away. Spend the day playing at Finns Recreation Club, watch the sunset over Tanah Lot Temple or shop and socialize in the popular oceanfront bars in Seminyak.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This enchanting home in southern Bali is part of Nyaman Villas, an exclusive community of six private residences located within walking distance of Seminyak Square. Designed by esteemed architect Stephan Remini, these villas balance serene privacy, traditional Balinese ambiance, and high-end amenities for dining and relaxation—all within minutes of some of the finest beaches and nightlife in Bali. The two-bedroom villa is ideal for couples or a small family, featuring sumptuous suites, beautiful bathrooms, and ample living areas (including a private swimming pool). Your vacation rental comes with security services, a butler, and a villa manager. Private chef services (among other deluxe offerings) are also available.Nestled amid lush tropical gardens and trees, the villa features 500 square meters of total living space. A cavernous living room forms the heart of the home, with a generous lounge, a dining table for six, and an open gourmet kitchen. Exquisite décor evokes the timeless character of Bali, at once traditional and firmly planted in the present moment. The room flows gracefully onto the terrace, creating a spacious venue for festive gatherings or tranquil relaxation. Step into the welcoming, gem-toned pool for a rejuvenating swim, and savor the sea-kissed air on lounge chairs perched beneath parasols.The bedroom suites flank the main living area, opening directly to the pool terrace. Each room features a queen-size bed, safe, desk, TV, walk-in closet, and semi-outdoor ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, tub, and alfresco rain shower. Air conditioning ensures comfort at all times.The villa offers a wonderful alternative to southern Bali's popular resorts, its prime location balancing the tranquility of a private home with proximity to Seminyak's famed nightlife. Walk about five minutes to the city square, or drive five minutes to Seminyak Beach or Petitenget Beach. Ngurah Rai International Airport is only twelve kilometers away, ensuring convenient access for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, contact a Villa Specialist. Tap into the magical energy of Tulum at Casa Adama. This contemporary Riviera Maya vacation rental draws inspiration from art and healing traditions from around the world, and uses sleek modern architecture to create both wonderfully open spaces and private hideaways. Even better, its location in the coveted Aldea Zama area is close to the beach, the ruins, and shopping and dining in town.Listen to the breeze move through the jungle from a ground-level terrace with loungers and a pool, or soak in the sun from a rooftop terrace with its own plunge pool. There’s also a gas barbecue, as well as high-tech amenities from a smart TV to Wi-Fi.The heart of this dramatic home is a living room with 25-foot-high ceilings, a glass wall opening to the pool area, and a collection of Balinese and Moroccan art and furnishings—think leather poufs and hand-woven rugs. It flows into another open-concept space with a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area around a gorgeous onyx table and a second sitting area.This luxury property has four bedrooms with king beds: three with en-suite bathrooms, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite that occupies 1,000 square feet on the villa’s third floor, and one with access to a hall bathroom. The fifth bedroom has two queen beds and an en-suite bathroom. The five bedrooms can accommodate up to twelve friends or family members on holiday together.Casa Adama’s location in Aldea Zama, an exclusive residential area, gives you easy access to both shops and cafés in the center of Tulum, and restaurants and beach bars along the road to the beach. Of course, it wouldn’t be a visit to Tulum without seeing the oceanfront ruins, also just a short drive away from the villa.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Trunks sprout in the great room and leaves wave outside this treehouse-like villa in the Costa Rica jungle. Two terraces offer up forest and ocean views, and sliding teak and glass walls make the house feel as though it’s grown up out of the lush landscape. It’s a 3-minute walk through the trees to the surf break at Playa Guiones, whose sandy bottom and quieter vibe are well suited to beginners. This vacation rental beckons you outdoors with a deck stretching the width of the house, an infinity pool, loungers set in the sunshine, a barbecue, and covered sitting and dining areas facing the ocean. A second deck has its own sitting and dining spots. Wi-Fi keeps you connected to friends and family at home, air conditioning keeps you comfortable, and laundry facilities are there for your convenience. The walls of this luxury property have three layers: a teak panel, glass and a screen, which you can close for privacy or open to let the breezes flow through. The open-concept living room and fully equipped kitchen gets its warm, welcoming vibe from teak ceilings and floors, and tree trunks supporting the ceiling add to the fresh-from-nature feel. The casa has two bedrooms with king beds, including one with its own terrace and one with a honeymoon-suite-worthy balcony and al-fresco bathtub and shower. The third bedroom has a queen bed and a twin bunk bed. All three bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms. If you’ve ever wanted to surf, a Costa Rica holiday is the time—and with Playa Guiones a 3-minute walk from the villa, you can practice on your own whenever you want or book a lesson with Safari Surf School, 6 minutes away by car. If you’re visiting between July and November, drive to Ostional National Wildlife Refuge to watch olive ridley turtles come ashore to lay their eggs. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This stunning two-bedroom contemporary villa is the perfect hideaway for a honeymoon couple, a small family or two couples. The stylish grand entrance creates a dramatic stage for a breathtaking sea view - sunsets are pure magic.The grand living room is open, airy with an opulent contemporary attitude. Floor to ceiling doors disappear into the wall providing unobstructed views and breezes. Sand color travertine tiles flow seamlessly from indoors to outdoors. Gorgeous designer furniture detailed in beautiful dark woods, comfortable upholstered seating and tasteful art create a relaxing interior lounging area. The color scheme is relaxing in cream, off white and taupe. The sleek and stylish open plan kitchen is open to the view and the exterior dining room, while the barbeque is adjacent to the kitchen. Throughout the villa, pots filled with tropical plants dot the terraces creating a Feng shui attitude.The two very large and equal size bedrooms are places of relaxing solitude furnished in cream bedding, beautiful fabrics, soft sand polished travertine tiles and beautifully inlaid woods. The spa style bathrooms are simply gorgeous, each one in unique combination of luxe woods, travertine and stainless fixtures. Both have oversized walk-in showers.Although secluded, you are close to amenities. You are 2 minutes to the grocery at Puerto Cupecoy and another five minutes to the airport. In 10 minute you reach the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case or Philipsburg’s shopping haven.

listing.listing_description: Burj Gate Penthouse is a spectacular apartment in the center of Dubai, an easy walk or drive from the city's famous opera, fountain, and mall, and about five kilometers from Jumeirah Beach. The penthouse enjoys breathtaking views of the sea and skyline (including the iconic Burj Khalifa building), while exquisitely furnished living areas offer a comfortable private haven for dining and relaxation. Accommodations for eight adults and two children make this vacation rental an ideal choice for families, destination wedding guests, and business travelers.High ceilings and ample windows infuse the apartment's living areas with abundant natural light and lofty, seemingly infinite vistas. A sumptuous salon welcomes afternoon tea or evening cocktails, and the adjoining dining table seats ten on beautiful baby-blue chairs. The kitchen has a vintage, mid-century modern feel, contemporary gourmet appliances, and a window bar serving the dining table and salon. A lovely floating staircase leads upstairs, where a second lounge forms a quiet sanctuary for private downtime. The villa's décor feels at once fresh and classically elegant, blending modern chic with touches of Arabian magnificence in the gold accents, stunning wallpapers, and delightful textiles.There are two bedroom on each floor of the penthouse—three with king beds and one with two twins—while an additional bunkroom sleeps two children. On the main floor, the master suite and primary guest suite both enjoy ensuite bathrooms, while the upper-level bedrooms share a bathroom between them. The views from all the bedrooms are truly spectacular.From the lobby of the building, you're an easy walk or quick drive (about one kilometer) to the Dubai Fountain on Burj Khalifa Lake, the largest choreographed fountain in the world, as well as the Dubai Opera and Dubai Mall (also the world's largest). Haute cuisine dining and high-end shopping surround you, while the white sands of Jumeirah Beach on the Persian Gulf are just five kilometers away. Proximity to Dubai International Airport allows for easy arrival and departure.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Discover a private romantic paradise in beautiful Kona, Hawaii! Twice featured in West Hawaii Today for its outstanding luxury qualities, Collessie By The Sea is nestled within an exclusive community overlooking the charming town of Kona. Here you will find an experience that will leave you and your loved ones with fond memories, while likely instilling a yearning to return year after year, like so many of the villa’s distinguished guests.Tumble out of bed and into the saline waters of the solar heated infinity swimming pool with cascading waterfalls. This luxury home enjoys a seamless Hawaiian indoor/outdoor living plan. Its disappearing walls of glass open to a limestone lanai with a large built-in gas barbecue, entertainment area and granite counter preparation area. This stunning vacation rental is located in the “golden triangle” with the perfect elevation, climate and proximity to Kona village and local attractions.Custom designed with high end interior and exterior finishes, including African mahogany, travertine stone floors and exotic granite. The gracious living room has a large screen television and comfortable seating. The designer kitchen is fully equipped for entertaining with decor to captivate a mood that inspires creativity alongside an eight burner gas stove, warming drawer, built-in fridge and walk-in pantry.Each of the three bedroom suites have bathrooms with floor-to-ceiling travertine walk-in showers with room for two. Each suite also has a flat screen television. Both the Aloha and Makai suites open directly to the pool and have exotic soaker tubs with dual vanities. Each sleeping quarter has been beautifully designed with high quality furnishings and Asian flair.Although difficult to leave such an oasis, premier beach access, shopping and golf are just minutes away. We also provide our guests with a list of recommended restaurants and activities. It makes a great bet for a family holiday or a decadent honeymoon. We want your vacation to be memorable, one that will have you falling in love with Hawaii, Kona and Collessie By The Sea!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: 134 421 9136-01NUC 19-479STVR-19-350346

listing.listing_description: Tanager House is an extraordinary alpine chalet at Big Sky Resort, just steps from Natawista Run and a minute's drive from Moonlight Basin Clubhouse (which guests can enjoy at extra cost). Situated within the Silvertip enclave—named by Architectural Digest among the world's "most beautiful hotel cabins"—the villa combines rustic alpine charm with sleek modern lines and high-end amenities, including a superb gourmet kitchen and lovely open-air hot tub. Majestic mountain views of the Madison Range, including Lone Peak and the Spanish Peaks, create an inspiring atmosphere both indoors and on the ample deck. Three king bedrooms plus a kid-friendly bunk room accommodate up to ten guests, ideal for families and large groups of friends.The chalet's main living room features a high ceiling of pickled wood and ample mountain-view windows. Sumptuous sofas face the stone hearth with gas fireplace and mounted TV. The open floor plan leads gracefully to a granite dining table for ten and a gorgeous kitchen with granite countertops, beautiful wood cabinetry, and stainless steel appliances. Glass doors open from the living room to a spacious deck, ideal for barbeque grilling, sipping hot cocoa in the mountain air, or crawling into the hot tub for soothing relaxation.The master suite opens directly to the deck with hot tub and features a four-poster king bed, TV, and ensuite bathroom. The guestroom on the main level includes a king bed, private sitting area, TV, and access to a hallways bathroom. The upper level features another king guestroom with TV and desk. The kids' bunkroom includes two bunk beds (sleeping four in all) and a cozy lounge. Heating and air conditioning ensure comfort in all season.The chalet's private, one-car garage also serves a spacious storage room for skis, snowboards, bikes, and other equipment. Natawista Run is just steps away, and you're about a minute's walk from Moonlight Basin Clubhouse, which features a fitness center, outdoor pool, year-round outdoor sports offerings, and a fabulous Jack Nicklaus Signature Golf Course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Hana is the brainchild of famed Australian designer and architect Stuart Membery, who created this masterful four-bedroom villa in Bali with such grace and forethought that some parts of the home seem to blend in seamlessly with the tropical surroundings. Villa Hana has room for eight guests or six adults and four children, who will revel in the estate’s unique style and many amenities. Minutes away from Echo Beach in the Canggu district, Villa Hana is the ideal place to stay while experiencing this amazing island.Children and adults alike are always big fans of both the fifty-foot swimming pool as well the media room with a 52-inch television, gaming console and DVD library. Whether you are lounging on the daybeds or enjoying a barbeque at the alfresco dining set, you will no doubt feel at peace in the tranquil and picturesque grounds. Additionally, the home features Wi-Fi and is surrounded by manicured tropical gardens attended by the estate’s artistic gardener. The villa is staffed with round-the-clock security guards, a butler and chef.The home’s walls feature portions that are made up entirely of natural stone set against tall tropical palm trees making the interior of the home very similar to the grounds located outside. A minimalist color-scheme of largely white contrasted with bold black door frames and entryways produces a dramatic effect. The walls have been adorned with fascinating murals that provoke excellent dinner conversation over the grand dining table.Villa Hana’s four en-suite bedrooms are all lavish in decor and amenities, including features such as air conditioning and flat-screen televisions. All the rooms have been equipped with plush king size beds, with the exception of the four-bunk room. The master suite additionally boasts an aristocratic dressing room and a private tropical garden.Life moves at a slower pace in pastoral Canggu as many locals have largely agrarian lifestyles. Excitement is within arms reach however, starting with Echo Beach lined with warungs, small traditional restaurants, and excellent waves for surfing. Just a couple of miles away, Finns Recreation Club, provides guests with a refined setting to partake in jovial social events and fitness facilities including fun activities for the tykes. Get the vacation you deserve in Bali with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Silent Waters is a spectacular villa at Montego Bay along the northwest shore of Jamaica. With its private heli-pad and ample space for cocktail or dinner parties, the villa forms an enchanting venue for special occasions; while resort-like features including a tennis court and fabulous pool make it a choice haven for family reunions. The villa's staff will enhance your experience with their warmth and professionalism (not to mention extraordinary home-made drinks and meals). To top it off, guests at Silent Waters enjoy access to the Tryall Club, named by Condé Nast as one of the finest luxury destinations in the world.An Asian-influenced ambiance distinguishes Silent Waters, with its dreamy koi pond, beautiful gardens, and harmonious design emerging gracefully from the exquisite landscape. The infinite pool overlooks panoramic ocean views and includes a lovely stepping stone path to the sunken patio. The poolside dining pavilion and bar offer enchanting havens for alfresco meals and cocktails in the Caribbean breeze.Bordering the pool, the villa's semi-open-air great room features vaulted ceilings, a lovely lounge, and a stunning dining table for large feasts. Broad thresholds open to the terrace, inhaling the ocean air and framing majestic vistas. Numerous salons and lounge areas are distributed throughout the villa, inviting you to savor cocktails by the piano or cuddle up with a favorite movie. Baby-friendly features and a fitness room round out the villa's family-oriented offerings.The eight well-appointed bedrooms feature various bedding arrangements to accommodate guests of all ages. The stunning Owner's Villa suite features a king bed, an ensuite bathroom, a living and dining area, and a private terrace with free-form pool and panoramic views. Each of the guest suites offers a unique ambiance and beautiful prospects of the sea or forest. Air conditioning ensures comfort in all seasons.Silent Waters is about a fifteen minute drive to Tryall Club, a world-renowned resort with 2,200 acres of spectacular oceanfront grounds. Top-grade offerings include pro-level tennis courts, an 18-hole championship golf, myriad watersports, a white-sand beach with waterfront café, and a fabulous restaurant in the vintage 19th-century Great House. Proximity to Sangster International Airport ensures easy access for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: Silent Waters welcomes the opportunity to host your special event. Whether you are planning an intimate sit-down dinner for 20 guests, a buffet dinner for 54 guests or an elegant cocktail party for 150 or more guests, our staff will assist you every step of the way. Silent Waters is the ideal venue to hold the perfect wedding, reunion, birthday party, anniversary or other memorable occasion. Please contact us for more information.

Guests may choose the villa’s prepaid gourmet meal plan or the grocery option. With the prepaid meal plan, the villa chef will prepare breakfast, lunch, pre-dinner hors d’oeuvres and dinner based on the villa’s elegant gourmet menus. The cost is $115 per adult per day and children aged 3 to 12 is $57.50 per child per day (rates are excluding 10% GCT). In lieu of lunch at the villa, boxed lunches can be provided for day trips. If choosing the grocery option, plan to pay for groceries locally in cash. A typical grocery budget is about $100-$110 per adult per day and young children about $45-$55 per child per day depending upon the type of menus selected. Shrimp, lobster and imported meats or large quantities of other food items will increase the budget (lobster is out of season April 1 – June 30 and, therefore, is unavailable during that period). Note that if choosing the grocery option, a fee of $12.50 per person per day will be charged for food acquisition and preparation. A pre-payment of $1,500 will also be required for pre-stocking of groceries for the first 1-1/2 days. With either option, the villa staff will work with you to determine the types of delicious meals you would like during your stay, as well as discuss any allergies and/or special dietary needs.

ul.li: _ Please note _ that all beverages (alcoholic and non-alcoholic) must be purchased from Silent Waters' liquor, wine and beverage inventory (guests may not bring in their own liquor / beverages). All beverages (and fresh fruit used at the bar) are charged separately and billed at the end of the stay. Additional charges apply for cocktail parties and other guest-hosted events.

listing.listing_description: Just below the crest of the mountain, off a dramatic drive, is Nid d’Amour. True to its French translation, Love Nest, the villa has been perfectly perched on the side of the hill to take full advantage of a truly spectacular view. Behind you are neighboring mountains; in front of you is the palm lined entrance to the villa. Enter the front door and a brilliant, variegated scene flows before you, painted in greens and blues. Within your scope are the tropical island mountains, Baie Rouge Beach and Marigot with its scenic marinas. To your left is Anguilla, so close you can touch it. The sightline stretches to Creole Rock in Grand Case and beyond to the Atlantic’s horizon. The sapphire sea, dotted with boats, is everywhere. Palms and sea grape and giant aloe frame the natural picture. It’s a perfect setting for a romantic tropical retreat.The villa takes full advantage of the mesmerizing vistas with large terraces filled with covered spaces for dining and lounging. The heated infinity pool with built in jetted tub, framed by columns, visually flows into the sea. Head up to the roof terrace for truly unobstructed 360 degree views and gorgeous sunsets.The interior’s tasteful sea inspired décor, in whites with touches of turquoise, compliments the view. The great room, with floor to ceiling glass doors, flows from the seating space into the charming French style kitchen which faces sea. Dine inside on the kitchen’s marble high top or in the splendid glass conservatory just off the kitchen; the view is the perfect backdrop for beautiful meals.The spacious bedrooms connect to the main house. Both face the sea and have semi-private outdoor seating spaces. The décor, in taupe and white with turquoise, blends with the vistas. Each en suite bathroom is spa like blending white cabinetry with natural stone and glass tiles. Large walk in showers have Indonesian river pebble floors and upscale fixtures. One shower opens to the view facing Anguilla.You are secluded yet close to amenities. It’s a short drive to Baie Rouge Beach. In 10 minute you reach the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case and Philipsburg’s shopping haven. Only a short 10 minutes to access the international airport.

listing.listing_description: Like its namesake, Black Pearl is a gorgeous and unique property that can accommodate both family vacations and couple’s getaways with ease. The brand-new four-bedroom villa is set on a hillside near Marigot Bay and has unforgettable views of the Grand Cul de Sac lagoon and the ocean beyond. Spend your stay basking in the Caribbean sunshine by the private pool or exploring the nearby beaches.Though the villa’s living spaces are comfortably air-conditioned, you’ll want to step outside to the terrace, which has covered sitting and dining areas and a sunny lounge area around the heated infinity pool. A gas barbecue makes it easy to try local specialties. After a day at the beach, turn on the satellite television and sound system or post your pictures via Wi-Fi.The interiors of Black Pearl have cool, contemporary lines that keep the focus on the gorgeous ocean views. The sleek great room is almost entirely white, save its pale wood floors and a playful orange cabinet, creating a clean, fresh feel. A long white sectional is a welcoming spot in the sitting area, and minimalist flat-fronted cabinets conceal everything you’ll need in the fully equipped kitchen.All four bedrooms at Black Pearl have queen beds, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning; for added privacy, there are two on the main floor and two on the lower level. The two bedrooms on the main floor have satellite television and ocean views, and one of the bedrooms on the lower level has satellite television as well. Like the common areas, the bedrooms have white walls and bedding and clean-lined furniture for a restful, minimalist vibe.Thanks to the villa’s location near Marigot Bay, it’s easy to try out beaches until you find the perfect one. It’s just under 600 meters to Marigot Beach, a 5-minute drive to Lorient Beach, 2.9 km to Petit Cul de Sac Beach, just over 4.4 km to Nikki Beach, 5 km to St Jean Beach and Saline Beach and 8.5 km to Gouverneur Beach. In the evenings, head to Gustavia, a 6.5 km drive away, for shopping and dining, and when it’s time to leave, Gustaf III Airport is a 4.2 km drive from the villa.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

All additional fees & all other service-related costs, will be subject to the taxes above.Take in the timeless beauty of Hawaii’s Kohala Coast from a newly renovated villa at Fairways South #25. Located on the grounds of the Mauna Kea Resort, the property has panoramic beach views and offers access to resort amenities like pools, golf and tennis. Despite its prime location, however, the villa feels quiet and private, with two bedrooms in two pavilions tucked into lush gardens.The villa is laid out around a beautiful courtyard with a pool and patio overlooking the ocean. Soak in the Big Island sunshine on a lounge chair, prepare local produce on the gas barbecue and enjoy sunset views with your meal at the al-fresco dining area. For more private lounging, there’s a covered lanai surrounded by verdant landscaping. Guests of the villa can also opt to pay for the amenities at the Mauna Kea Resort, from oceanfront pools, fitness centers and preferred parking to reduced rates at the golf course and tennis club.The living areas at Fairways South #25 are in the villa’s south wing and open to the central pool terrace. A recent renovation transformed the living room and kitchen into modern spaces with a relaxed yet elegant feel, thanks to redwood wall paneling, tray ceilings and tile floors set in a herringbone pattern. The living room is lined on three sides with sliding doors, infusing the room with the greenery outside, but tuxedo sofas and a patterned rug give the space refinement. The fully equipped kitchen has a cozy galley layout and practical breakfast bar.Cross the breezeway from the south wing to the north wing to reach the villa’s two bedrooms. Both have king beds, en-suite bathrooms with outdoor showers and private access for complete seclusion if you wish. The master suite opens to the pool and has ocean views, while the second bedroom has its own wet bar. Bright bedding and rattan furniture give the bedrooms a definite island vibe.From Fairways South #25, it’s only a 5-minute drive to some of Hawaii’s best beaches, famed for their soft white sand and warm turquoise water. Take a 15-minute drive into the village for more shopping and dining. When your stay is over, plan on a 20-minute drive from the resort to Kona International Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Besame is an exquisite luxury home in the renowned Pedregal enclave of Los Cabos, just a short walk from a private beach and minutes from the heart of Cabo San Lucas. Perched at the southernmost tip of Baja, the villa commands panoramic ocean views where the Gulf of California meets the vast Pacific. Fabulous outdoor amenities (including a 70-foot infinity lap pool and a rooftop splash pool) invite you to savor the open-air lifestyle of this seaside paradise, while luminous interiors offer an enchanting venue for dinner parties or intimate gatherings. Four spacious bedroom suites offer superb accommodations for multiple couples, families, and destination wedding guests.The villa's vibrant white surfaces and elegant lines contrast beautifully with the lush hillside, vibrant gardens, and dreamy hues of the sea and sky. A marble terrace yields to an alluring saltwater pool with adjoining spa and lovely water features, while the breezy, shaded dining area includes a well-appointed outdoor kitchen and a gas fireplace for cooler evenings. The poolside lounge invites you to sip delicious cocktails while marveling at the sublime sunset.Plentiful windows and sliding glass doors infuse the interiors with natural light and sea-fresh breezes. The main living area features a comfortable salon, gourmet kitchen, and dining table opening to the terrace and pool. Tastefully curated artwork and discretely placed stainless steel appliances lend a chic contemporary edge to the ethereal space. Central air conditioning keeps the ambiance cool when needed.The bedrooms are furnished with a harmonious minimalism, emphasizing the natural splendor of your surroundings. There are three suites with king beds and one with a queen bed, and all enjoy ensuite bathrooms. The master bathroom includes a retractable roof above the shower and a lovely soaking tub beneath a bloom-like chandelier. Three of the bedrooms enjoy ocean-view balconies, while the fourth opens to the pool and lawn. The villa also includes a library/study with ocean views.There is hardly a finer location in Los Cabos for enjoying exquisite privacy within easy reach of its world-class beaches and legendary nightlife. You can walk to the beach at Pedgregal or drive a few minutes into Cabo San Lucas. Several golf courses are close by, and Playa Medano is about fifteen minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: There’s a certain style of rugged-luxury that exists in the Napa Valley, and this breezy wine country-home captures it perfectly. Spend your nights under the stars, tasting all the local vineyards best creations while the fire warms you. Use the trendy kitchen to craft locally-inspired meals. But First, head 4-minutes into Saint Helena to pick up some fresh produce from the farmer’s market.A-list interior decorator, Jay Jeffers, crafts a unique mixture of contemporary furnishings, antiques, and bold patterns, accents walls, and works of art in Casa Pelota. Sure to spark conversation, your dinner parties and social occasions will easily benefit from the vibrant decor. Especially when the terrace doors are slid open and the hosting space doubles.Feeling active? Swim a few laps in the pool or challenge a friend to a match on the bocce court. After, celebrate your victory by recharging your batteries in the soothing hot tub. Depending on your vibe, Casa Pelota’s formal and alfresco dining tables are perfect on nights in; both have seating for 6. After dinner, turn up the sound system, get a fire going, and try a few more local wines.First thing’s first, get out and find your new favorite vineyard. Napa Bike Tours and the Napa Wine Train are great ways to see a wide selection of wineries, and they don’t require a car. Then, dine at Harvest Table, a restaurant that prides itself on locally sourced ingredients and a beautiful terrace setting. After dinner, catch a flick at Cameo Cinema, which has been open since 1913.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Gardenia is a stunning beachfront home within the Miskawaan Estate on the north coast of Koh Samui. A luxury hamlet of eleven villas on Maenam and Bangrak beaches, Miskawaan offers an extraordinary venue for weddings, special occasions, or family reunions at a serene remove from the island's popular resorts. Your villa blends vintage Thai elegance with high-end modern comforts, featuring a private swimming pool, exquisite living and dining areas, and a superb staff including a talented chef. Five spacious bedroom suites offer ideal accommodations for ten guests.The estate enjoys 27 meters of absolute beach frontage and panoramic views of the Gulf of Thailand. Multiple pavilions form a symmetrical bay around the terracotta-framed saltwater pool. Stylish loungers invite you to savor the South Pacific sun in the dappled shade of dreamy palms, while a small stairway leads to the beach's soft white sands. A kayak is available for excursions across the glittering expanse, and an outdoor shower greets you upon returning for delicious refreshments and meals.There are two adjacent dining areas: a beachfront pavilion with expansive ocean vistas, and an interior table overlooking the pool. The main salon features high, vaulted ceilings, comfortable furnishings, and a high-end television. With extraordinary paintings and artisanal design pieces adorning the luminous walls, the villa's décor is at once vibrant and timeless, embodying age-old traditions while focusing your attention on the present moment.The master suite enjoys a privileged perch opening to the pool terrace and a beachfront veranda. An interior lounge and television accompany the king bed, and its deluxe marble bathroom includes a shower and bathtub. Two of the guestrooms include king beds and two include pairs of twin beds or split kings. All open directly to the outdoor living areas and feature ensuite bathrooms, air conditioning, and safes.Its name meaning "Buddha's gardens," Misawaan Estates offers an extraordinary balance of privacy and convenience. Your staff can help you plan a wide array of activities nearby, from watersports to cooking classes, yoga retreats to Muay Thai lessons, waterfall zip-lining to "Frisbee golf." Royal Samui Golf is within easy reach, and the island abounds in gorgeous temples and natural splendors.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Entertain family and friends in style in the balmy California weather at Clubhouse. This beautifully appointed vacation rental has an array of luxury amenities, more than 3,000 square feet of space and four bedrooms, divided between a main house and a casita. Its Indio location means it's only minutes to several golf courses, the Coachella festival grounds, Indian Wells and more.Clubhouse feels like your own private resort thanks to outdoor living areas with a pool, hot tub, putting green, a kitchenette with a barbecue and wine cooler, a firepit and fireplace, plus spaces for lounging, sitting and dining. The amenities continue inside, where you'll find a satellite TV, pool table and Wi-Fi.The villa's newly remodeled interiors pair mid-century influences with a contemporary open-concept layout. Catch up on the sleek gray velour sectional in the sitting area, perch on a robin's egg blue stool at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen, or gather everyone around the clean-lined dining table in wishbone-style chairs.The main house at Clubhouse features a master bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathrooms, as well as two bedrooms with a queen bed and two twin beds, respectively, that share a bathroom. With its queen bed, en-suite bathroom, living area and kitchenette, the casita could be used as a honeymoon-style escape or a quiet retreat for in-laws.Whether you've come to the Desert Cities for a festival, sporting event or just a holiday in the sun, you're close to the action at Clubhouse. From the villa's location in a gated community, it's a 10-minute drive or less to three different golf courses, the Coachella festival grounds, the tennis at Indian Wells and downtown Indio. For a day trip, drive to Joshua Tree National Park for a look at the otherworldly landscape or downtown Palm Springs to discover its mid-century architectural gems.City ID # 20-00019908Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A haven of contemporary style awaits in the wilds of Costa Rica at Villa Monoi. This brand-new luxury vacation rental is tucked into a gated community just steps from Playa Tamarindo and Playa Langosta via private beach access. Reserve its four bedrooms for a tropical escape with friends or warm-weather getaway with family.Spend sunny days relaxing by the villa’s pool, reading in the sun loungers or playing at the beach, after which you can stow gear in the secure storage area. Finish with dinner from the barbecue or a chilled-out evening by the TV, Sonos sound system, Wi-Fi and wine cooler.A fold-away glass wall is all that separates the villa’s open-concept great room from the terrace, giving the interiors a bright, airy feel. Natural textures and sculptural furnishings—think live-edge coffee tables, woven loveseats and low-profile stools—lend a casual yet chic feel in the sitting area, dining area and breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.Three of the four bedrooms at Villa Monoi have king beds and views of the pool and garden. The fourth bedroom, with its two twin bunk beds and alfresco shower, is great for families on holiday with younger kids. All four bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans.Though it started as a surf town, the Tamarindo area has grown into a great beach destination for all ages. Try surfing on the nearby beaches or just play in the turquoise waters, take a day trip to the pristine Marino Las Baulas National Park, enjoy activities from hiking to golfing, and end the day with a honeymoon-worthy dinner at an oceanfront restaurant or a lively night out in one of the town’s bars and clubs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A pair of glass towers with thatched crowns compose this stunning contemporary villa in the South Kuta region of Bali. Situated within the fully-staffed Dayu Mirah Resort, the home includes a private infinity pool, expansive outdoor living areas, and sweeping views of the forested hills. Drive 6 kilometers to Pandawa (one of Bali’s “secret beaches”), and experience the sublime beauty of Uluwatu Temple.Villa Lingkar balances exquisite modern design with evocative traditional features, including a wooden footbridge connecting the towers. Sun loungers, a chair swing, and an alfresco shower accompany the lagoon-like swimming pool, while a canopied daybed offers a cool haven for restful afternoons. In the main tower, a shaded living/dining area with gourmet kitchen occupies the bottom level, beneath the master suite with private balcony. The other tower features a guest suite on each level. Glass walls infuse the rooms with natural light and panoramic views.The gated Dayu Mirah Resort offers security and serenity within easy reach of some of southern Bali’s finest destinations. Take a short drive over the South Kuta hills to Pandawa Beach, known for its soft sands and swimmer-friendly waters, or head west for the famed surf breaks of Suluban. Right beside Suluban is Uluwatu, a majestic sea temple regarded as one of the most important sites in Balinese Hinduism. Travelers can also choose from myriad watersport and eco-adventure outfits, as well as 2 golf courses in the vicinity.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sitting on Anguilla’s South Shore, Odyssey - Kamique commands stunning views of a secluded beach cove and the mountains of St Martin. You will be just paces away from a private swath of cool white sand, complete with padded sun loungers, shaded day bed and gazebo. Dramatically nestled in the rolling landscape to form special enclaves, the surrounding waters at Odyssey are protected by a reef that offers calm waters and excellent snorkeling.Jump into an impressive rectangular infinity swimming pool, great for laps or just cooling off. Take advantage of the two outdoor showers as you make your way into ample patches of sun and shade overlooking the clear waters of the Caribbean. A gas barbeque sets the tone for some luscious alfresco dining. Indoors at Odyssey, you will find a home entertainment system and Wi-Fi. The villa is wheelchair accessible and makes a great bet for multigenerational families and diverse groups. Your reservation includes management, concierge and housekeeping services as well as daily continental breakfasts.The modern and chic interiors of Odyssey showcase a rich blend of woods, stone and concrete to create a sensual, yet modern island environment. A touch of the tropics provides a sense of romance at this idyllic escape. The atmosphere blurs the line between inside and out and orchestrates light and shade to create peaceful oases among the ongoing dance of chiaroscuro patterns.The four exquisite bedrooms at Odyssey accommodate up to eight fortunate guests. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, ceiling fans, televisions and complimentary l’Occitane toiletries. The two grand master suites each offer an outdoor shower with a private sunning area. Fall asleep with nothing but the sound of ocean waves as your soundtrack.During your stay at Odyssey - Kamique, you will be within easy reach of the beach and ocean, town and groceries as well as the CuisinArt Golf Course and Spa. In nearby Sandy Ground, “the entertainment capital of Anguilla,” you will discover a sleepy village by day that lights up at night with imaginative beach bars and hot night spots. History buffs can also stop in at the Heritage Museum or the Amerindian Ceremonial Site to take a glimpse into this island’s rich past. Come experience the best of Anguilla!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Ski-in/ski-out access gets you onto the slopes immediately from this ultra-luxe mountain home, aloft in the snowy peaks of renowned ski-resort Deer Valley Resort. Mountain Glade rests within the exclusive gated community of Deer Crest and enjoys panoramic views of the glittering Jordanelle Reservoir.Nine thousand square feet of luxurious living space offers plenty of room for large groups and extended or multiple families to have a ball! Step over the threshold of this magnificent alpine haven and you’ll see why. Acres of natural wood have been put to good effect in making this ski home warm and friendly. Deep-cushioned sofas and leather armchairs invite you to take a seat in the glow of the towering stone fireplace and admire the awe-inspiring views through cathedral-like windows. The vista extends into the neighboring dining room and gourmet marble-topped kitchen with its handy breakfast bar and its chef-ready stainless steel range.Honeyed wood floors, vaulted ceilings and timber clad walls are bathed in natural light from the huge windows while potted plants, comfortable furniture and soft rugs lend a welcoming homely feel to Mountain Glade. The house’s many fireplaces offer cozy resting places after a day on the slopes and there is plenty of entertainment on offer at the family room’s pool table and in the impressive home theater with its stadium seating and beanbags. If you really must work there’s a study with desk and computer, or you can pull a book from the shelf and settle into a fireside leather recliner. Stargazing from the outdoor hot tub is the perfect way to end the day.Six ultra-comfortable spacious bedrooms can easily accommodate up to 17 people and the rustic wood twin bunks are a novelty for kids. Soak away any cares in one of the deluxe en-suite’s deep tubs and settle into bed to dream of your next day’s ski adventures.You can ski directly onto the slopes from Mountain Glade or travel to Main Street Park City which is 10 minutes away. In town you’ll find restaurants and grocery stores as well as golf and tennis courts. The airport is a 44 mile drive.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Indulge in a resort-worthy experience at Villa Amapas North. Set on the ocean in the famous Conchas Chinas in Puerto Vallarta, the three-bedroom villa welcomes you with a full staff, charming architecture and decor and suite-style bedrooms with ocean views. To accommodate the whole family, the villa can be rented with its sister property, Villa Amapas South.Your stay at Villa Amapas North includes cook service, housekeeping, a houseman and night watchman and one transfer from and to the airport, leaving you free to relax in the beautifully landscaped outdoor living area. The villa opens to an oceanfront terrace with a row of lounge chairs, heated infinity pool, bar, barbecue and two dining areas, one formal and another one alfresco. Fountains and a garden invite peaceful contemplation, but you can also work up a sweat in the fitness area. For entertainment, there’s satellite television, a DVD player and Wi-Fi, and to ensure your comfort, the villa has an elevator, water purification system and air conditioning.The open living areas at Villa Amapas North are the perfect mix of casual and formal. In the living room, beamed ceilings, stone walls and a built-in sofa create a traditional spot to gather, but you can also open the wide Parota wood doors and nap on the wicker sofa while enjoying the ocean breeze. A unique stone rectangular dining table is a memorable setting for a special meal, while a fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar is ready to handle a quick breakfast or snack time.On the villa’s ground floor, you’ll find a studio-suite with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, ocean views and terrace access. On the second floor, the Master Suite with a king size, beautifully framed by an intricate iron sculpture, en-suite bathroom with tub, ocean views and terrace access, and a second bedroom with two queen beds, ocean views and terrace access.From Villa Amapas North, it’s only a 10-minute walk to Los Muertos Beach and Zona Romantica (restaurant row), a 6.4 km drive to Playa Camarones and a 10.3 km drive to Playa de Oro. You’ll find assistance at the Medasist hospital, 2.3 km away, and shopping and dining in downtown Puerto Vallarta, 10.3 km away. Stroll the Vallarta Botanical Gardens, 21.6 km away, or play a round at Nuevo Vallarta Golf Course and Mayan Palace Golf Course, both 24 km away, or Flamingos Golf Course, 28.4 km away. Plan on an 13.1 km drive from Puerto Vallarta International Airport to the villa.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.NOTE: Villa Amapas North can be rented together with Villa Amapas South (https://www.luxuryretreats.com/vacation-rentals/mexico/puerto-vallarta/conchas-chinas/villa-amapas-south-115438).

listing.listing_description: Listen to the hush that settles over the mountains while the snow falls at Chalet Tarentaise. Nicknamed “the birdhouse” for its unique shape and hillside perch, this contemporary Colorado vacation rental affords 270-degree views that sweep from the valley to the ski slopes. It’s tucked into a quiet neighborhood so you can enjoy the scenery in peace, but is only a short drive from the skiing, dining, shopping and more in central Steamboat Springs.Winter stays at the chalet include shuttle service and continental breakfast. The villa’s deck features a private hot tub where you can watch the stars or the latest snowfall. (For summer visitors, there’s also a barbecue.) Entertaining indoors is a snap thanks to a TV, fireplace and Wi-Fi, while a ski storage area and boot dryers ensure everyone’s convenience and comfort.Behind the unusual façade of this luxury villa, you’ll find a classic great room with an open-plan living area, dining area and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. Wood floors and a stone fireplace surround lend natural texture to the space, while leather sofas and dining chairs tie the different areas together.The four bedrooms at Chalet Tarentaise can accommodate up to ten guests—enough room for an extended family or a holiday shared by several couples. There are two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed and a second bedroom with a queen bed. The other two bedrooms share a bathroom and have a queen bed and a king bed (or two twin beds), respectively.During ski season, the complimentary shuttle will take you the 5 minutes to Steamboat Ski Resort or make the 8-minute drive to the nearest grocery store. In the summer, it’s an easy 9 minutes to the scenic Rollingstone Ranch golf course. No matter what time of year you visit, be sure to spend an afternoon splashing in the pools at Steamboat Springs Old Town or a honeymoon-worthy evening soaking underneath the stars at Strawberry Park’s hot springs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A glass kitchen wall unfolds to views of Colorado’s Flat Top Mountains at this bright modern-mountain home in Steamboat Springs. It’s tucked behind a grassy rise for a private feel in the front; in the back, slopes and sky stretch out before the deck. Walk to Trailhead Lodge and drive 4 minutes to the Steamboat Ski Resort base. Get your fill of the mountain air on a pergola-covered deck with an alfresco sitting area and barbecue. You’re also welcome to use the heated outdoor swimming pool, 3 outdoor hot tubs, and firepit at Trailhead Lodge. Stretch out in the lodge’s fitness center and face off against friends and family in the games room. Tall ceilings, oversized windows, and cool grey tones give this luxury property a bright, airy vibe. It’s laid out around an open-concept great room with a sitting area overseen by a playful bear artwork, a dining table for 6, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar that opens to the deck. Let kids watch a movie in the separate lower-level living area while the grown-ups sip something from the wine fridge. This vacation rental’s 4 bedrooms are spread out over 3 levels. If you’ve brought the whole gang on holiday, there are 2 available bedrooms with twin-over-double bunk beds. Grab gear from the mudroom or 1-car garage and walk to Trailhead Lodge to board the Wildhorse Gondola for Gondola Square and its ski school, honeymoon-worthy restaurants, and lively apres-ski scene. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Thoughtful modern design and a convenient slope-side location make Dwell on Woodside an easy choice for a relaxed ski holiday. Set on a ski run and just steps from Park City’s charming downtown, this luxury vacation rental couldn’t make it simpler to spend your days on the trails and your evenings exploring the area.You’ll want to spend most of your stay skiing, hiking or otherwise enjoying Utah’s incredible natural scenery. But when you return to Dwell on Woodside, step onto the private balcony for a soak in the hot tub or to prep dinner on the barbecue. Inside, you can relax in front of the fireplace with a selection from the wine fridge or share snaps of your trip over the house’s Wi-Fi.The villa’s interiors are an intriguing mix of old and new, traditional and contemporary. Though the beamed, vaulted ceilings, stone mantel and iron chandelier of the living room bring to mind stately European estates, the plush sofas, playful beanbag chair and colorful glass art have a more relaxed feel. Slipcovered chairs seat up to eight at the dining table, and drafting stools offer four more perches—and a great view of the artwork—at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.If you’ve come out West for the skiing, you’ll appreciate the walk-in/walk-out access to Park City Mountain Resort and the 5-minute drive to Deer Valley Resort. You’re also just a short walk from downtown Park City, which has everything from the playful Park Silly Sunday Market and quaint historic architecture to honeymoon-worthy restaurants and lively nightlife. Other local sights include the Swaner Preserve and EcoCenter and Utah Olympic Park, and if it’s not a true getaway without golf, you’ll find a course just 2.5 miles away. When it’s time to leave, stop in to see the up-and-coming scene in downtown Salt Lake City on your way to the airport there.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Stay in a mountainside haven of mid-century cool at Peak View Place. Part of the exclusive Home Run Trail development, this luxury townhouse offers ski-in, ski-out access to Northstar California Resort. Its three bedrooms and chic interiors are perfect for a winter getaway to Lake Tahoe with family or a group of friends.This vacation rental has its own furnished outdoor living areas with a hot tub, barbecue and firepit, where you can while away summer evenings or indulge in a soak after a day of skiing. Inside, you’ll find an Apple TV, Wi-Fi, a gas fireplace and a wine cooler, as well as conveniences from laundry facilities to heating and air conditioning.Floor-to-ceiling glass frames the views of mountains and forest in the open-concept great room. Watch TV in mod style in a sofa and lounge chair inspired by mid-century classics in the sitting area, or take a seat at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. A wall of cabinetry and matching wood floors give the space an inviting warmth.Peak View Place has one master suite with a king bed and private en-suite bedroom, as well as two bedrooms with queen beds that share access to a hall bathroom. If you’re on holiday with the kids or need more flexible accommodations, there’s also a bunk room with two twin bunk beds where the younger set can giggle the nights away.To give you the feeling of a honeymoon from everyday life, the villa offers ski-in, ski-out access to the Home Run ski run at Northstar, and is only a 10-minute drive from the resort’s base. For shopping and dining, make the 10-mile drive into downtown Truckee. And if you’ll be visiting during the summer, it’s less than a 10-mile drive to the nearest beach and the closest golf course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.TOT # 123228

listing.listing_description: Olympus is a luminous contemporary gem situated on a beachfront estate near Rum Point on the north shore Grand Cayman. Masterfully designed to optimize its seaside setting and panoramic ocean views, the 3,000-square-foot home features ample alfresco living areas including a pool deck and superb rooftop terrace, along with spacious, stylish interiors illuminated by expansive glass walls. Four ocean-view bedrooms accommodating twelve guests include a family suite and a stunning master suite with private terrace. Your vacation rental includes on-island benefits provided by Silver Thatch, including reservation services, a variety of discounts, and access to fitness and business centers.Pristine white sands extend from the villa's pool terrace to the verge of the crystalline Caribbean, inviting you to plunge into the dreamy water and survey the vast horizon. Tile patios and lounge chairs frame the wrap-around pool, while the ipe wood deck hosts a chic lounge for afternoon refreshments in the shade. The rooftop features the villa's pièce de résistance: a voluminous terrace with sheltered dining table, kitchen, open-air lounge, and 360-degree views of the island and sea.A 40-foot, floor-to-ceiling glass door opens from the pool deck to the villa's interior, imbibing the ocean's light and breeze. The ample salon includes a large flat-screen TV, while the open, chef-appointed kitchen boasts a marble-topped island beside a beautiful wood dining table. Pure white walls and sleek lines accentuate the island light and hues of sunset, while natural wood furnishing and accents infuse a rustic note into the ethereal ambiance. The media room is perfect for afternoon downtime or cozy nights, and there is a furnished home office for business travelers.The bedroom suites at Olympus offer exquisite private havens for couples, individuals, and families, featuring ensuite bathrooms, high-end entertainment systems, air conditioning, and breathtaking ocean views. The exceptional North King Suite opens to a well-appointed terrace and features a bold glass wall to maximize its privileged ocean vistas. The family suite includes a queen bed, sofa bed, and kitchenette.The prime location of Olympus balances seaside seclusion and convenient proximity to some of the finest clubs, beaches, and nightlife spots on Grand Cayman, with Rum Point Club, Kaibo Yacht Club, and Starfish Point all within five to ten minutes of your door._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This spectacular luxury villa on the southwestern shore of Phuket Island is just minutes from Kamala Beach. Its exquisite indoor and outdoor living areas are perfectly situated for enjoying the panoramic ocean views and breezes ("Samira" means "cool breeze"). For families, destination wedding guests, and adventurous friends seeking a unique and breathtaking setting for their Thailand adventure, this six-bedroom vacation rental will be unforgettable.The villa's extraordinary design—a contemporary variation on classic Thai themes—includes a spectacular pool terrace and equally impressive alfresco Great Room overlooking the Andaman Sea and the Bay of Bengal. Enjoy fresh mornings bathing in the hot tub and floating in the nineteen-meter infinite swimming pool. Relax on poolside loungers, withdraw beneath the parasol for cocktails, and relish a barbeque lunch at the lovely alfresco table. In the evening, gather in the open Great Room, with sumptuous furnishings and soaring ceilings, to savor the beautiful sunset.Sliding glass walls invite delicious ocean breezes and dreamy views into the villa's gorgeous living and dining areas. Enjoy evening aperitifs in the elegant lounge. Prepare your favorite Thai dishes in the fully equipped kitchen, and congregate at the lovely dining table for ocean-view feasts. At night, retire to the media room to watch movies on the projector screen, or play a game of pool in the game room. Upon waking in the morning, refresh your body in the spa. Private chef, spa, and other services are available at extra cost.The villa's superb master bedroom suite features a king bed, an ample and furnished balcony with ocean views and a jetted plunge pool, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. The five guest bedrooms all feature king beds, too, along with balconies, ocean views, and ensuite bathrooms (two with ocean-view tubs). The king bed in bedroom six can be converted into two twins.Villa Samira enjoys an ideal balance of serene seclusion and convenient proximity to the island's cultural and natural riches. Kamala Beach is just six kilometers away, while Patong Beach and Surin Beach can be reached in minutes. Golf lovers are an easy drive to Red Mountain Golf Course and Laguna Golf Course. The bustling town of Patong is a fifteen-minute drive from your garage.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Greens and bunkers roll gently underneath the palms outside this traditional-outside, modern-inside home near Kauai’s north shore. Beyond the fairways, you can spot the Pacific from the villa’s broad veranda. Walk to Pu’u Poa Beach at the St. Regis Princeville resort and drive to the postcard-perfect curve of Hanalei Bay, where you can swim, snorkel, and snack at food trucks parked near the pier.For sunny Hawaii days, there’s a swimming pool; on balmy island nights, stay outside on the lanai to count the shooting stars. After days playing in the sand, rinse off in the private lava-rock alfresco shower.Beneath the villa’s steeply pitched roof is a bright, L-shaped great room with a sitting area, dining area for 6, and a fully equipped kitchen. Leaf-green area rugs and wicker furniture bring the tropical surroundings inside, and there’s even a surfboard used as decor. Sliding glass doors at opposite ends of the space let you open it up to the warm trade winds.Go swimming or try snorkeling at Pu’u Poa Beach, a short walk from this vacation rental, then walk up to the St. Regis resort on the beach as they sabre champagne to celebrate sunset. It’s a short drive to Hanalei Bay, whose 2 miles of sand are dotted with surfing schools, kayak and paddleboard outfitters, and food trucks dishing out poke, tacos, curries, and Hawaiian-favorite shave ice.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: TA-056-003-8912-01

listing.listing_description: This architectural gem in Costa Rica is located directly on Santa Teresa Beach, a fabulous destination famous for its surf waves, pristine sands, and delicious cuisine. Steps from the heart of town, Casa Teresa offers an ideal alternative to the region's hotels and resorts, featuring exquisite Spanish Colonial charm and artistry, exceptional amenities, and ample space for relaxation in total privacy. Four king bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms accommodate families, destination wedding guests, corporate retreats, and groups of friends up to eight in size.Expansive outdoor living areas form the perfect haven for festive gatherings, special occasions, or inspired relaxation. Bask in the tropical sunlight or the dappled shade of lush trees, and dip into the pool for a refreshing swim. Step directly from the property onto the pristine sands of Playa Santa Teresa, and plunge into the luminous sea. Savor a siesta in the canopied bed and sip delicious fruit juice in the lounge. Relish alfresco meals on the veranda or at the large picnic table in the yard. Then admire the sublime sunset from the ocean's edge, and linger outdoors amid the enchanting nighttime lighting.Sliding glass doors open from the veranda to the villa's interiors, breathing the ocean air into the home. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and a fabulous marble wet bar, easily serving the various living and dining areas. Beautiful details like the arched front door, vaulted foyer, and blue-tiled interior fountain cast an enchanting spell of antique Spanish America.All four bedroom suites feature comfortable king beds, TVs, air conditioning, and ensuite bathrooms. Two open to the side yard, and two open directly to the pool and beach, with lovely ocean views. The superb master suite includes a walk-in closet and deluxe ensuite bathroom with dual vanity and both indoor and outdoor showersSanta Teresa has been hailed as the "next Tulum" by the New York Times and an "idyllic, healthy oasis" by Vogue. A short walk from the town's main drag, you're within minutes of some of the finest nightlife spots, seafood restaurants, eco-adventures, and watersport venues in the region. The wonderful town and beach of Carmen are just seven minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
