listing.listing_description: Impressive large half-moon windows lined up across the industrial-chic steampunk living room add visual interest to the sophisticated deep gray, black, and white palette throughout this apartment. It’s a modern space for business entertaining with the compact gloss white L-kitchen or to meet up with old friends, or to see and be seen in one of the artsiest areas of London. Practically everything in Soho is within walking distance, taxi or tube from here.Berwick Street I is in a repurposed industrial building. A lift takes you to the door. A glass- walled entry with black accents creates the impression of open space. But, it’s a retro 50’s take on a business divider creating a structured flow from room to room. The layout is perfect for late afternoon cocktail parties or intimate after-theatre suppers. Dropping into your favorite fabric shops or searching for that rare, long-lost vinyl before heading back to change for cocktails and dinner with friends works perfectly here.Soho is the heart of the theatre district. All the little antique shops, delightful cafes, and restaurants, its jumble of clothing boutiques, fabric shops, and most notably rare record shops combine to shape and define this unique area.Ala-carte services are available for amenities like a private chef, grocery shopping, pre-stocking, or arranging any particular activities, or outings. Our concierge service is just a phone call away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This superbly placed, modern and maritime-styled listing is located right on Ffryes Beach, one of Antigua’s very best. With storybook white sands and turquoise waters, guests can take advantage of a surfing, snorkeling and jet-skiing paradise, before retiring to the seaside terrace and crisp, cool infinity pool. The bright lights of St.Johns, the capital, are just 25 minutes drive away. This apartment is packed with possibilities for a small family / group of friends. From the entrance, guests can literally walk onto Ffryes Beach with towel in hand and choose a pristine spot to soak up the Carribean sun. After a dip in the wonderfully warm water, pick up an Antiguan speciality (jerk chicken, or freshly fried fish) from a beachside restaurant, before taking a short walk to the towering ruins of the local sugar windmill. Similarly, Tamarind Hills Silver is the perfect starting point for an island drive, taking in stunning seaside cliffs, leafty palm-covered hills, and cool drinks in welcoming roadside bars. Guests can also opt to enjoy Antigua’s famed hot weather and sea views from the listing itself, via a shaded sun lounger or by lingering in the pool. The apartment’s climate control is never more than a few steps away, where the airy balcony and ocean-view windows ensuring a true sense of place is established, with all the modern conveniences one would expect. When night comes, fire up the barbecue and try some of the Antiguan ways of cooking, with fresh food from the local market. On this island, nothing is ever too far, and the colourful streets of St.Johns just a short drive away, with its hive-of-activity markets, welcoming harbourside bars and the great buzz of game days at the Cricket Grounds. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Kir Royale takes its cue from the mid-century modern architecture that dots the landscape of Palm Springs’, Vista Las Palmas neighborhood. This elegant villa rises from the foothills of Mount San Jacinto to reveal its unique design and seamless indoor/outdoor living spaces to the world. Let this spacious, four-bedroom home be your desert oasis.The villa features top-shelf amenities that will make your stay unforgettable. Savor the tranquil ambiance around the pool as you sun yourself on a designer chaise longue or daybed. You’ll also find a tanning shelf, to ensure an even California tan. Cool off with a dip in the pool, or under the refreshing spray of a misting system. At night you can walk up to the elevated spa and relax under the stars or host a gathering by the glow of a gas firepit. The open-air living room will allow you to maximize your outdoor experience. It houses comfortable seating, and kitchenette with barbecue.The interior blends modern and Regency-style décor to perfection, creating an atmosphere of vintage luxury. A spiral staircase with walnut steps anchors the home. Terrazzo floors lead you from room to room where you’ll discover plush sofas, subtly installed electronics, fireplaces housed in custom walls and designer lamps and chandeliers. The gourmet kitchen features Boffi fixtures and high-end appliances, making cooking a pleasure. Contemplate the desert-view from the yoga and meditation room.The Master bedroom occupies the upper lever and opens onto a private deck, with exterior stairs leading down to the pool terrace. Its well-appointed en-suite holds a spa-shower and free-standing tub. The second and third bedrooms are on the ground floor, each with a Queen bed, en-suite and access to the pool. The remaining room is in a charming, self-contained casita with a private patio, kitchenette and en-suite.You won’t have to look far for activities in Palm Springs. Start with a stroll around Vista Las Palmas and the Movie Colony neighborhoods and experience mid-century homes that drew Hollywood’s elite to the desert. The Coachella Valley is home to over 80 golf courses set against breathtaking backdrops. You’ll also find national parks with hikes for all skill levels. Shop and dine at the eclectic shops and restaurants along Palm Canyon Drive.Palm Springs Registered Tax Number: 3031Palm Springs City ID: 202Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Azure, cerulean, teal, sapphire—see all the shades of blue from the veranda of this classic Caribbean home in the lush hills of St. Martin’s quiet Mont Choisy area. The only thing interrupting the vistas of sea, sky, and pool is a sun-kissed terrace stocked with loungers and studded with the occasional palm tree. More palm trees ring intimate Happy Bay Beach, a 10-minute walk downhill.You’ll be welcomed to this vacation rental by a transfer, breakfast basket, and the sea stretching to the horizon over a swimming pool, plunge pool, and hot tub on the terrace. Work up a sweat in the well-equipped gym and infrared sauna, pour a glass from the wine cooler for refreshment, and share photos of your holiday over Wi-Fi.Glass walls and a pass-through invite the views and the breeze inside the house. The wood-paneled veranda roof soars up to a vaulted ceiling over the living area and a fully equipped kitchen with good-enough-to-eat cherry-red cabinets in a high gloss. Just through the kitchen is a dining area that’s walled on one side, open to the vistas on the other.This luxury property has three bedrooms with king beds, two of which have their own private entrances, and one bedroom with two twin beds that can be connected to the master king bedroom for a family traveling with younger children. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.Drive 5 minutes into Grand Case to shop or pick up takeout, then tote a picnic on the 10-minute walk to Happy Bay Beach, whose clothing-optional shores are perfect for couples wanting to relive their honeymoon, and Friars Bay Beach, a kid-friendly spot that also has a beach bar. It’s also 15 minutes or less to shopping and dining along Orient Bay Beach and in Marigot, the capital of the French side of the island.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Miramar is located in the heart of Tulum’s famous Caribbean coast, one and a half miles south of the historic Mayan ruins. The point at which the surf breaks directly in front of the grand palapa room offers the best snorkeling in Tulum. Sit in the cool water of your private swimming pool and count the rolling ocean waves as they turn from blue to green. It’s all about the sun, the surf and the azure sky at this contemporary oceanfront beach house.The breezy, sun-drenched palapa creates the perfect atmosphere for quiet contemplation, romance or entertaining friends, family or business associates. Enjoy oceanfront views, or take a dip in the swimming pool while entertaining guests with a barbeque cook-off. Your villa provides a cocktail deck, patio with lounge area, alfresco shower, lounge chairs, sound system and iPod dock. Enjoy a dining area for twelve, perfect for any kind of dinner party.With popping pink accents and rich wooden decor, you’ll feel immersed by this Mexican palace. The deluxe kitchen at Villa Miramar includes a white marble breakfast bar and stainless steal luxury appliances. Create a meal in the most elegant atmosphere. Lounge in the living room in the circular couch and enjoy spectacular ocean views. With the glass doors open, you have a balanced atmosphere of indoor and outdoor living.With five king bedroom suites, all with private en-suite bathrooms, Villa Miramar can accommodate ten guests in great comfort and style. Enjoy a private palapa and ocean view in the master bedroom. Fine linens and accoutrements provided splendid nights of rest with nothing but the sounds of ocean waves as your soundtrack.Villa Miramar is a vacation home that will provide you with a treasure trove of memories. Combining the mystery of the ancient civilization which inhabited this zone with the singular beauty of the Caribbean Sea that bathes its shores, this trip to Mexico is sure to be one for the books! Activities are endless including the Mayan Ruins, cenotes, eco parks, snorkeling, scuba diving or swimming with dolphins. Villa Miramar is a peaceful haven and the perfect place to celebrate something special!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: Stay in a mid-century icon at Villa Sierra. With its streamlined architecture, glam interiors and mountain views, this Desert Cities vacation rental is the quintessential Palm Springs residence. Its four bedrooms and 5,300 square feet of space can welcome groups of up to eight in vintage-inspired luxury.This California-cool ranch home opens to equally stylish outdoor living areas with a 75-foot pool, hot tub, wet bar, barbecue, and lounging and dining areas. On cooler desert nights, gather around one of the three firepits and watch the shapes of the mountains turn to silhouettes, or settle in around the wet bar and pool table in the chic indoor lounge and games room. (Keep an eye out for a limited-edition Clairtone stereo that’s the same model Sonny and Cher had in their Palm Springs home.)Relaxing amid the villa’s collection of vintage and global furnishings is like stretching out in a magazine spread. Two lounge areas, including one with a wet bar, invite you to mix cocktails and settle in for a chat. The fabulous pistachio-green, fully equipped kitchen has a smoked-glass breakfast table, and there’s a separate formal dining room that seats eight friends or family in playful pink chairs.Villa Sierra has one master bedroom with a king bed and three bedrooms with queen beds; all four have private en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms exude a decadent mid-century-meets-Hollywood Regency vibe—think slipper chairs, chandeliers and mirrored panels.Spend your holiday soaking in the sun by the pool or exploring the area. The villa is just a 5-minute drive from downtown Palm Springs, where you can take architectural tours by day and sit down to honeymoon-worthy dinners by night. For avid golfers, there are two courses nearby; for non-players, there’s the inspiring Moorten Botanical Garden and the Palm Springs Art Museum.Palm Springs City ID: 4037Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This breathtaking villa is situated in the Tabanan Regency of southwestern Bali, steps from Pasut Beach. A visionary architectural masterpiece, the home consists of five elliptical forms fused into a cloud-like structure, with spacious living and dining areas and three deluxe bedroom suites. The villa is perched on a secure estate with a private swimming pool, beautiful lawns, and views of the Indian Ocean. Each of the bedrooms features a king bed and ensuite bathroom, ideal for multiple couples, destination wedding guests, or a family. Your vacation rental includes complimentary manager, butler, and housekeeping services, with multiple premium options available.The lush estate offers an enchanting venue for special occasions or serene relaxation. The swimming pool echoes the shape of the home's front facade, with ample room to play and bathe. Elegant lounge chairs arrayed on the terrace beckon you into the exquisite light, while the sprawling lawns extend toward coastal rice paddies and the vast ocean.The interiors feature a superb open kitchen flanked by a living room and dining room. Large glass walls open to the pool, infusing the home with an alfresco ambiance. Luminous white surfaces accentuate the artful décor of teak, onyx, petrified wood, and exposed rock. The sleek kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and a lovely marble breakfast bar. The lounge area features superb furnishings, a high-end TV, and an elegant chess table, while the gorgeous dining table seats twelve beneath flower-like lamps.A floating staircase forms the threshold into the dining room and ascends to the master suite: the apex of the home. The suite features a lovely in-room tub in addition to an ensuite bathroom with rain shower. The two guest suites are on the garden level, facing away from the pool. Each features an ensuite bathroom with rain shower opening to a stone tub on a private patio. Like the living areas, the bedrooms are furnished with a minimalist elegance, including beautiful, naturalistic objects and original artwork.From this private retreat at Pasut Beach, you're just short drive to Abian Kapas Beach and less than twenty kilometers to Tanah Lot Temple and Nirwana Bali Golf Club. The famed beaches and nightlife at Seminyak are about thirty kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Terra Nova is an unforgettable property nestled in the heart of Sonoma Valley. Located on 3 acres of beautifully landscaped natural abundance, the lovely five-bedroom villa draws its influences from Mediterranean villas with subtle accents that are pure wine country contemporary. The exterior features earth tones and an infusion of natural materials, allowing the villa to blend in perfectly with its pastoral surroundings. Best of all, you won’t have to go far to begin your appreciation of America’s best wineries.A majestic oak anchors the circular driveway, its boughs waving hello. You’ll find numerous outdoor living spaces surrounding the villa. A range of patios, verandas, and terraces provide you with distinct - and distinguished - settings for enjoying the beauty of the countryside. One patio, extending from the kitchen, sheltered by an arched ceiling, features a cozy dining alcove with a stone fireplace. Another outdoor terrace houses a lengthy al fresco table where you and your guests can enjoy leisurely brunches and dining under the stars.Inside, the large great room is a sight to behold. Stunning antiques and carefully selected furnishings create an elegant and welcome ambiance. Feel a fresh breeze wind its way through French doors, as you relax on ultra-comfortable sofas and chairs. At the head of the great room, with a massive stone fireplace, an immense wooden dining table awaits any banquet you may wish to serve, or you can choose to enjoy the services of Villa Terra Nova private chefs or Sonoma County caterers. Sonoma Valley’s reputation for food cannot be overstated, and Villa Terra Nova’s professional grade kitchen will allow you to make the most of locally-sourced ingredients. You’ll find five spectacular bedrooms in the villa, individually decorated with a particular color in mind. The spacious Master suite features an office, walk-in closet and spacious en-suite bathroom with soaking tub and rain shower overlooking an enclosed garden featuring seasonal colors. Three of the Villa's guest bedrooms have their own en-suite bathroom as well.The property is a mere 4 miles from the historic Sonoma Plaza, where shops, restaurants and cafés await you. From there you can start your tour of the Sonoma tasting trails, selecting from hundreds of world-class wineries and iconic wine country towns that not only offer fine wine, but unforgettable culinary experiences year-round. Located in the center of the Sonoma Valley, guests are within minutes of nearby Kenwood and Glen Ellen with a scenic 30 minute drive to the Napa Valley.Sonoma County Vacation Rental TOT Certificate #1047NCopyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This charming Creole style villa is a peaceful oasis set in a lush and colorful tropical garden. The view combines iconic Caribbean elements; swaying palms, beautiful foliage and glimpses of the sapphire sea. Whether you are relaxing inside or lounging outside, it is beautiful, private and poetically romantic. It is also a versatile villa. You can rent it alone for a honeymoon or cozy getaway. For larger gatherings, it can be rented along with its sister villa, La Pinta, to expand capacity. The two villas also share a tennis court and gym. This self-contained paradise is a wonderful place to simply shut the door on the world.La Nina makes the most of its outdoor spaces. The beautiful crystal clear pool is the center piece of the spacious covered terraces and sundecks. You have multiple choices for lounging and al fresco dining allowing you to accommodate small or large parties.The interior living space, with areas for lounging and dining, is an open plan concept, flowing seamlessly from inside to outside. Large pocket doors disappear into the wall allowing the view and breeze to come inside. The décor is contemporary with a cozy vibe. Oversized taupe wicker and cream fabrics complement the amazing stone wall in the living room. Charming painted furniture in neutral tones create a modern twist to Creole classics. The sleek, well equipped kitchen opens to the terraces allowing the chef to connect with the guests.The two equal size bedrooms are set off the pool deck. The décor is fresh and contemporary with an old world Caribbean twist. Painted furnishing in taupe and cream are complimented by elegant linens in tan, cream and white and colorful artwork. The feel is cozy and elegant. The en suite spa style bathrooms are beautifully detailed in travertine tiles, sculpted sinks and walk in showers.Although secluded, you are close to amenities. Long Bay and Plum Bay beaches are a short drive. You are ten minutes to the airport. Grand Case is only 25 minutes by car or head to Phillipsburg for some Duty Free shopping.

listing.listing_description: This magnificent chalet is situated within the Moonlight Basin enclave at Big Sky Resort in Montana, with ski-in/ski-out access to Cinnabar Run. Perched on a hillside with panoramic mountain views, the chalet is perfectly designed for savoring the open-air delights and cozy pleasures of Montana. High-end amenities include an outdoor hot tub, alfresco lounge and dining area, a gourmet kitchen, and a well-equipped game room. Four spacious bedroom suites plus two kid-friendly bunkrooms accommodate families and groups of friends up to twenty in size. At extra cost, guests can enjoy access to Moonlight Basin Clubhouse, including its Jack Nicklaus Signature golf course.The main living room offers a quintessential setting for après-ski relaxation, with double-height ceilings, a beautiful stone hearth, fine timber beams, and ample windows gazing out on breathtaking vistas. The dining table seats eight on lovely leather chairs, and the open kitchen features chef-quality appliances, a generous island with extensive breakfast bar, and a lounge area in a luminous nook.The covered deck features high, peaked ceilings and a wonderful outdoor fireplace, forming a comfortable setting in any season. Downstairs, the mountain-view family room includes a wet bar, TV lounge, fireplace, and tables for foosball and pool. A separate media room includes a large flat-screen TV and another wet bar, and there is also a home office.The master bedroom is on the main level, with a four-poster king bed, panoramic mountain views, and a large fireplace. Its beautiful ensuite bathroom includes a dual vanity, walk-in shower, and a soaking tub perched beneath an antler chandelier. The primary guest suite is upstairs, featuring a king bed, extraordinary views, a fireplace, and an ensuite bathroom with shower and tub. The upstairs bunkrooms accommodate up to eight children. The bottom floor includes two suites: one with a king bed, one with a pair of double beds.The villa has a two-car garage and a ski rom with lockers and boot dyers. You can ski directly on and off the intermediate-friendly Cinnabar Run (the ski-out section is also beginner-friendly), and Powder Run is just a short walk away. Nearby Moonlight Basin Clubhouse features a fitness center, outdoor pool, and extraordinary outdoor sporting opportunities.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Breathtaking views over the Atlantic, resort-worthy outdoor living areas and contemporary architecture add up to a fantasy come true at Camps Bay Dream. Whether you’re entertaining as the sun sets over the ocean or relaxing after a day of sightseeing in Cape Town, leave it to this vacation rental to provide an ambience of laid-back luxury.The panoramic views are best enjoyed from the villa’s three levels of private terraces facing the ocean. On the ground level, there’s a spectacular living space with shaded sitting and dining areas, an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue, an infinity pool and a deck with loungers in the sun; other levels feature sitting areas. Inside, the villa’s amenities range from the spa-worthy to the high-tech, including a sauna, Wi-Fi, grand piano and wine cellar.Sleek and modern, the villa is laid out around an open-plan great room whose glass wall takes in vistas from the Twelve Apostles across Camps Bay to Lion’s Head and Table Mountain. In addition to the main-level sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen, there’s a ground-level bar and kitchen area that opens to the pool terrace for easy entertaining.There are four bedrooms in the main house and one in the guest house; together, they can accommodate parties of up to ten friends or family members. In the main house, there are three bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and one bedroom with a king bed and shared hall bathroom. With its king bed, en-suite bathroom and separate entrance, the guest house makes the perfect haven for the couple still on honeymoon.With the boutiques, oceanfront restaurants and sugary sands of Camps Bay Beach just a 5-minute drive from the villa, you can spend more of your holiday enjoying the spectacular setting. If you’d like to explore beyond Camps Bay, it’s a short drive to Clifton Beach and the attractions of central Cape Town, from the V&A Waterfront to the famous Table Mountain cable car.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A burbling creek, swaying aspens and the silent, stately Gros Ventre mountain range are your neighbors at the private Fish Creek Lodge 2. Newly built in a peaceful setting outside Teton Village, this Jackson Hole vacation rental is a year-round retreat that’s perfect for family trips to Grand Teton National Park in the summer or ski holidays with friends in the winter. But despite the wild surroundings, three suite-style bedrooms, beautiful finishes and state-of-the-art touches provide plenty of luxury.The stone-and-timber lodge is a cozy sanctuary in the shadow of the Tetons, with a welcoming fireplace, a separate media room for curling up in front of a favorite movie and, of course, Wi-Fi, so you’re never far from friends. In warmer weather, heat up the barbecue, gather at the outdoor dining area on the stone terrace and watch the stars come out from the Adirondack chairs or the hot tub. Kids will love toasting marshmallows in the outdoor fireplace.Rough-cut timber, barn doors and a stone fireplace surround play off soft upholstery, graphic area rugs and playful floor lamps for a mountain lodge look with a modern twist. The great room at Fish Creek Lodge 2 soars thirty feet high and is flooded with light—and views—from the floor-to-ceiling window. No matter what the weather in Wyoming, you’ll be comfortable in a leather armchair by the fire or a refined nailhead-trim seat around the dining table. Even the fully equipped kitchen pairs the rustic with the state of the art, blending weathered wood panels and barn lights with a quilted-steel backsplash and Wolf range.Each of the lodge’s three bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom; two have king beds worthy of a honeymoon suite, and the third has two bunk beds. There’s also a king sofa bed in the media room for larger parties. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms mix the traditional and contemporary, with touches like stone fireplaces, wood floors and wool blankets to provide pops of color.Though the villa’s setting feels secluded, it’s not isolated. In the summer, ride the nearby Jackson Hole bike path into downtown Jackson or all the way to Grand Teton National Park; in the winter, there’s a complimentary ski shuttle to transport you to the base of Jackson Hole Mountain Resort. For an entirely different mode of transportation, try a paragliding session from a nearby hillside into the meadows near the villa. Test your skill on the landscapes of the two nearby golf courses, soak in a natural pool at Granite Hot Springs or visit the relatively untamed nature of Yellowstone National Park. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 14-mile drive from the lodge to Jackson Hole Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Open one wall of the sliding glass doors in this sleek silver-grey-blue living room, and you can feel the urban vibe of Green Point. The 180-degree view stretches to the Atlantic. There are a generous open deck and seating that overhangs the peak. This is the yin side of the house, bustling, vibrant, and hip.On the opposite side of the room is a matching set of sliding glass doors that bookend the minimalist living room. They open onto an elaborately tiered, latticed wood terrace with a raised lap pool running its length ending at an outdoor fireplace with bank seating in-between. This is the yang side of the house, tranquil, calm, and peaceful.Stay in or go out is always the question at One Springbok. It’s strategically located in the center of Cape Town and works for getting around and seeing things then heading back to relax and unwind. Somerset Road is the main street in this neighborhood for restaurants, delis, cafes, and nightclubs.One Springbok is perfect for entertaining. Open and airy with night views of the glittering city, add the soft glow from the pool and dancing light from the fireplace, creates dramatic points and counter-points. With the open galley kitchen and dining area central to the living room, friends and family can mingle from dusk to dawn, watching the sun break over Table Mountain.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located on a beautifully scenic countryside property in Central Algarve, this spacious Portuguese vacation rental is perfect for a family reunion, high-end corporate retreat, or destination wedding. With six ensuite bedrooms, lavish interiors, and a back terrace decorated with lush lawns and vibrant greenery, you’ll have no trouble setting the mood for an unforgettable event or vacation. Nearby, you’ll be able to visit the sandy shores of Faro Beach, explore natural and historical wonders, experience authentic Portuguese cuisine at the many restaurants in Estoi and its neighboring towns.Vila Vale Mouro’s elegant white-washed exterior provides the perfect contrast to the vibrant blues and greens of Algarve. Decorated with arched doorways, lavish water features, a swimming pool, and intricate stonework, Vale Mouro’s scenic terrace is sure to melt all your stresses away. Inside, the open concept lounge contains the formal dining area and living room. The focal point of the room is an imposing stone fireplace with a widescreen television above. Just beyond, a wide, arched doorway to the fully equipped kitchen makes sure the social flow and atmosphere of Vila Vale Mouro aren’t interrupted, even when preparing meals. And upstairs, each en-suite bedroom possesses its own unique character, thanks to their exciting accent walls.During your stay, you’re sure to appreciate the villa’s entertaining features, like cable television, Wi-Fi, an integrated sound system, and a game room with a ping pong table and video game console. At dinner, Vale Mouro has formal dining inside for twelve and space for fourteen at the alfresco set on the terrace. For something more casual, fire up the wood oven and try your luck at making pizza.When it’s time to get out and explore Algarve, Estoi is the perfect place to start. Spend an afternoon wandering the winding cobblestone streets and village square, which is just a short walk from Palacio do Visconde de Estoi, an eighteenth-century palace considered to be one of the finest buildings in Algarve.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
